itunes:title: Women & Men in The Word: New Testament Week 5 with Jada Edwards
title: Women & Men in The Word: New Testament Week 5 with Jada Edwards
description:
For the fifth week of our Women & Men in the Word: New Testament series, Raechel and Amanda are joined by author, speaker, and Bible teacher Jada Edwards. Together the three laugh and cry as they discuss this week’s readings, along with Jada’s love for Paul in Scripture and the power of the local church. And one thing keeps ringing true throughout the entire conversation: Jesus is what matters most, and every story is about Him.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth Women & Men in the Word: New Testament reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Women & Men in the Word: New Testament collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 20% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code SUB20. July’s box will include our upcoming Ephesians Study Book.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/wmitwnt-week-5-with-jada-edwards/
